name: occultist basic
matches: ^(\w+) makes a quick, sharp gesture toward you\.$
^(\w+) passes \w+ hand in front of you. You feel an invisible claw brush the back of your skull, but quickly brush it off\.$
^(\w+) passes \w+ hand in front of you. You feel an invisible claw brush the back of your skull\.$

^(\w+) places both hands on either side of your head and stares straight into your eyes. A ghostly ocher light gleams from \w+ pupils and shoots into your eyes, and your mind expands with alien and strange visions\.$
